basics.name: Andriy Solonyna
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: An experienced software developer. 9 years of extensive programming experience in developing web based applications and Client-Server technologies. I worked at early-stage start-ups as well as big enterprise projects. Mostly used Ruby and Ruby on Rails but open for new programming languages and technologies. Have practical experience with Javascript frameworks like React and Vue, cloud technologies (AWS) and container orchestration systems. I enjoy programming. I love to create things and solve complex problems. I love that people use what I built.

work.name: SoftServe
work.description: SoftServe is the bigest Ukranian digital consulting company.
work.summary: Managed a feature development team at Cisco Secure Endpoint (Formerly AMP for Endpoints)
highlights: Trained and mentored programmers in programming methodologies and best practices.
Assisted in designing new microservices architecture on cloud first infrastructure to help empower development teams
Delivered complex business driven features on a monolithic rails application in a scrum setting
Worked with large datasets from different sources to generate both real-time dashboards and reports for past periods
Developed integrations with other security solutions

work.name: SoftServe
work.description: SoftServe is the bigest Ukranian digital consulting company.
work.summary: Participated in the pre-launch stage and the construction of the back end and front end for multiple startups
highlights: Developed service which adds subtitles to the videos and transcodes video using Amazon Elastic Transcoder
Created few extentions for Canvas LMS like study calendar, services which imports data from other learning management systems
Eveloped application which extracts billing inforamtion from photos of documents
Designing and implementing of service which allows customers to create and track deliveries

work.name: LEZGRO
